text:
Microsoft | Redmond | Boston | not-remote

Looking for devs passionate about dev & data scientist productivity:

Work on a hosted Jupyter service (JS/linux/docker). Looking for senior web FE dev:

http://notebooks.azure.com

Work on mac/linux/win IDE's (JS/TS) for R, Python users:

https://code.visualstudio.com/

Work on Visual Studio IDE (C#/C++) for R, Python users:

https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/features/python-vs.aspx https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/features/rtvs-vs.aspx

Almost all our work in open source & on github.

Contact: smortaz@microsoft.com with "HN Job" in Subject: field with resume please.
